item.title: Noclip auto ban only kicks... No ban
item.dc:creator: @fungame4u fungame4u
item.description:
@fungame4u wrote:

Just use this

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights < 3)) { logout(); }

Fill out your name also… This will simply log them out and it flows much nicer than a kick

There is no need to ban them as they don’t even get to abuse noclip

Read full topic

item.title: Noclip auto ban only kicks... No ban
item.dc:creator: @barrage_time barrage time
item.description:
@barrage_time wrote:

Try this one,

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; }

Read full topic
item.source: Noclip auto ban only kicks... No ban

item.title: Noclip auto ban only kicks... No ban
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

Here is my codes:

[code] else if(command.startsWith(“noclip”) && playerRights < 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to noclip and has been autobanned!");
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}

else if(command.startsWith(“getbonus”) && playerRights < 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to getbonus and has been autobanned!");
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}

else if(command.startsWith(“maxhit”) && playerRights < 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to maxhit and has been autobanned!");
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;
}

else if(command.startsWith(“setitem”) && playerRights < 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " tried to setitem and has been autobanned!");
appendToBanned(playerName);
disconnected = true;[/code]

They just disconnect you but don’t ban you.

Read full topic
